member.name: T:FileTypeDetective.Detective
member.summary: Helper class to identify file type by the file header, not file extension.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.GetFileType(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Read header of a file and depending on the information in the header return object FileType. Return null in case when the file type is not identified. Throws Application exception if the file can not be read or does not exist

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.ReadFileHeader(System.IO.FileInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the file header - first (16) bytes from the file

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.isFileOfTypes(System.IO.FileInfo,System.Collections.Generic.List{FileTypeDetective.FileType})
member.summary: Determines whether provided file belongs to one of the provided list of files
member.returns: true if file of the one of the provided types; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.isFileOfTypes(System.IO.FileInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether provided file belongs to one of the provided list of files, where list of files provided by string with Comma-Separated-Values of extensions
member.returns: true if file of the one of the provided types; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.GetFileTypesByExtensions(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the list of FileTypes based on list of extensions in Comma-Separated-Values string

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsType(System.IO.FileInfo,FileTypeDetective.FileType)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is of provided type
member.returns: true if the specified file is type; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsPdf(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is PDF.
member.returns: true if the specified file is PDF; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsWord(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file info is ms-word document file
member.returns: true if the specified file info is doc; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsZip(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is zip archive
member.returns: true if the specified file info is zip; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsExcel(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is MS Excel spreadsheet
member.returns: true if the specified file info is excel; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsJpeg(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is JPEG image
member.returns: true if the specified file info is JPEG; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsRar(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is RAR-archive.
member.returns: true if the specified file info is RAR; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsRtf(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is RTF document.
member.returns: true if the specified file is RTF; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsPng(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is PNG.
member.returns: true if the specified file info is PNG; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsPpt(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is Microsoft PowerPoint Presentation
member.returns: true if the specified file info is PPT; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsGif(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified file is GIF image
member.returns: true if the specified file info is GIF; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsExe(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Checks if the file is executable

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.Detective.IsMsi(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Check if the file is Microsoft Installer. Beware, many Microsoft file types are starting with the same header. So use this one with caution. If you think the file is MSI, just need to confirm, use this method. But it could be MSWord or MSExcel, or Powerpoint...

member.name: T:FileTypeDetective.FileType
member.summary: Little data structure to hold information about file types. Holds information about binary header at the start of the file

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.FileType.#ctor(System.Nullable{System.Byte}[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default construction with the header offset being set to zero by default

member.name: M:FileTypeDetective.FileType.#ctor(System.Nullable{System.Byte}[],System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct. Takes the details of offset for the header
member.param: The header offset - how far into the file we need to read the header
